name: Arctic Fury 3D Off-Road Snowmobile Parking Extreme - Snow Mountain Stunt Racing Simulator FREE
name_original: Arctic Fury 3D Off-Road Snowmobile Parking Extreme - Snow Mountain Stunt Racing Simulator FREE
description: Are you ready for extreme winter snowmobiling action?  Shred the slopes on your high performance vehicle.  The goal seems simple.  Park your snowmobile.  Sounds Easy?  WRONG!  This game will break your face.  10 insanely challenging levels, deadly traps, explosives, massive cliffs, frozen rivers and much, much more await you.  Do you have what it takes?  Realistic 3D graphics will immerse you and accurate physics reward you for excellent performance.  Download it today!
